NIT Manipur is located at **Langol, Imphal-795004, Manipur (India)**. It is situated in a scenic urban campus.
We offer B.Tech, M.Tech, M.Sc, and PhD programs. **Engineering Departments**: CSE, Civil, Electrical, ECE, Mechanical. **Sciences**: Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics.
We have **2 Boys' Hostels** and **1 Girls' Hostel**. Hostel admission forms are available at the Chief Warden's office.
The mess serves both **Vegetarian** and **Non-Vegetarian** food (Chicken/Fish/Egg). Common items include rice, roti, dal, and seasonal vegetables. Special meals are served every 15 days.
You can find Warden contact details in your specific Hostel Block notice board. For portal issues, you can lodge a complaint here directly.

To report an issue: 
1. **Login** to your student account.
2. Go to 'Lodge Complaint'.
3. Fill details and upload proof (if any).
4. Submit! You can track status in your dashboard.
To access the portal, click the **Login / Sign Up** button at the top right. Students can sign up using their institute email ID.
This **Student Feedback Portal** creates a direct link between students and administration. It ensures transparency, tracks complaint resolution, and helps improve campus life.
**Zero Tolerance!** NIT Manipur is a ragging-free campus. Please report any such incidents immediately to the Anti-Ragging Committee or use this portal to report anonymously.
